titles.title: Office of Space Commerce Act
To rename the Office of Space Commerce and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Science, Space, and Technology.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.

bill.summary:
5/12/2015--Introduced. Office of Space Commerce Act
This bill renames the Office of Space Commercialization as the Office of Space Commerce.
The Office of Space Commerce shall:
foster the conditions for the economic growth and technological advancement of the U.S. space commerce industry; coordinate space commerce policy issues and actions within the Department of Commerce; represent Commerce in the development of U.S. policies and in negotiations with foreign countries to promote U.S. space commerce; promote the advancement of U.S. geospatial technologies related to space commerce in cooperation with relevant interagency working groups; and support federal government organizations working on Space-Based Positioning, Navigation, and Timing policy.
